TopicTitle: REGRESSION: Pressing M in VAB opens map view (mods installed)

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.4.1 (latest) | Mods: bepinex, spacewarp, micro engineer, maneuver node controller, uitk for ksp2, flight plan, node manager, mapview focus and targeting, lazy orbit boosted | Can replicate without mods? No 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 5600 6-core Processor | GPU: NVIDEA GeForce RTX 3060 | RAM: 15.91GB

 

NOTE: see screenshot for modlist.

I had one craft 'parked' next to the launch pad. I went in VAB and built some new stuff. I wanted to search for Monoprop..., I pressed M, mapview opened.
Leaving mapview puts me back to this parked vessel


The only cause I can think of is the "Flight Plan" mod. I added it before this playing session and have never experienced this bug since 0.1.1.0 when it was fixed. (Also not with the other mods installed!)
The thing is that Flight Plan is, a manoeuvre node mod... not really the type of mod I expect to reintroduce this bug, so I am making this report just in case that mod didn't cause it and it is a real regression.

 

Included Attachments:

KerbalSpaceProgram22023-10-1413-52-19.mp4

Edited October 14, 2023 by Anth12
I mean, first step is to remove mods one by one and see if it persists. If you can't replicate it without mods, it's almost certainly a mod issue.

On 10/14/2023 at 6:38 PM, The Aziz said:

I mean, first step is to remove mods one by one and see if it persists. If you can't replicate it without mods, it's almost certainly a mod issue.

yes but anth told me to make the report anyways so I did that
